author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3710: Change CloudSolrServer so that update requests are only sent to leaders by default.

author: adrianc
msg: Fixed a costly call to UtilValidate:
UtilValidate.isEmpty(Object) calls ObjectType.isEmpty(Object) - which performs a series of instanceof checks. Calling UtilValidate.isEmpty(String) avoids the expensive instanceof checks.

author: adrianc
msg: Fixed a bug in GenericServiceJob where the failed method would get called twice.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3710: Change CloudSolrServer so that update requests are only sent to leaders by default.
